node.statement: Step 1.2.2 (q-melonic self-energy): The q-bubble identity implies that the leading (melonic) self-energy diagram evaluates to Sigma_melonic(q) = J delta_{m,m-prime} / [N]_q, where [N]_q = [2j+1]_q. This has the same structure as the undeformed case but with [N]_q replacing N, ensuring the melonic Schwinger-Dyson equations close.
